summary: My First mod. Looking for people to give advice and point out things I messed up on.
descriptionHtml:
My First mod. Nothing new so to say, only used the Skyrim.ESM, so no DLC should be needed.
Second time using the Creation Kit, first time was following step by step with Bethesda\'s Tutorial.

Just a dungeon outside of Dragon Bridge, follow the road out of Dragon Bridge to Solitude and look to the mountains. You\'ll see the big ugly dungeon outside.(I wanted to use the mine Ex but couldn\'t find one).

Let me know if the mobs all worked, if there are any CTD\'s, Bugs, cuts into the void, lag, etc.

I have a bunch of mods such as RLO so let me know how the lighting is as well.(is it to Orange?)

The file should be clean. used TES5Edit.
EDIT: In the first hallway is there a glitch in the right wall passed the first light? I cleaned my mod and then that appeared. can anyone confirm?
author: User_5094879
